commentText: This is a great tutorial! I particularly liked the section on using `use-client` correctly with server components. Thanks for sharing!
Awesome post on Tailwind responsiveness. The example for custom breakpoints was super helpful for my latest project.
Interesting approach to the CI/CD pipeline! Why did you choose CodeBuild over GitLab CI for the deployment stage?
originalPostTitle: CI/CD with AWS and Docker: From Zero to Deployment
